page.title: List of programs broadcast by NBC

revisions.rev:
__NOTOC__ This is a list of programs '''currently''' and '''soon to be broadcast''' by the [[NBC]] television network.
==Currently broadcast by NBC== ===News and information=== * ''[[Meet the Press]]'' (1947âpresent) * ''[[Today (NBC program)|Today]]'' (1952âpresent) * ''[[NBC Nightly News]]'' (1970âpresent) * ''[[Dateline NBC]]'' (1992âpresent) * ''[[Early Today]]'' (1999âpresent) * ''[[Rock Center with Brian Williams]]'' (2011-present)
===Drama=== * ''[[Law & Order: Special Victims Unit]]'' (1999âpresent) * ''[[Chuck (TV series)|Chuck]]'' (2007â2012) * ''[[Parenthood (2010 TV series)|Parenthood]]'' (2010âpresent) * ''[[Grimm (TV series)|Grimm]]'' (2011-present) * ''[[Harry's Law]]'' (2011âpresent) * ''[[Prime Suspect (U.S. TV series)|Prime Suspect]]'' (2011-2012)
===Sitcoms=== * ''[[The Office (U.S. TV series)|The Office]]'' (2005âpresent) * ''[[30 Rock]]'' (2006âpresent) * ''[[Community (TV series)|Community]]'' (2009âpresent) * ''[[Parks and Recreation]]'' (2009âpresent) * ''[[Up All Night (TV series)|Up All Night]]'' (2011-present) * ''[[Whitney (TV series)|Whitney]]'' (2011-present)
===Reality/non scripted=== * ''[[The Apprentice (U.S. TV series)|The Apprentice]]'' (2004âpresent) * ''[[The Biggest Loser (U.S. TV series)|The Biggest Loser]]'' (2004âpresent) * ''[[America's Got Talent]]'' (2006âpresent) * ''[[The Sing-Off]]'' (2009âpresent) * ''[[The Marriage Ref]]'' (2010âpresent) * ''[[Love in the Wild]]'' (2011-present) * ''[[The Voice (U.S. TV series)|The Voice]]'' (2011âpresent) * ''[[Fear Factor]]'' (2001â2006; resuming 2011)
===Soap opera=== * ''[[Days of our Lives]]'' (1965âpresent)
===Late Nights=== * ''[[Saturday Night Live]]'' (1975âpresent) * ''[[Last Call with Carson Daly]]'' (2002âpresent) * ''[[Late Night with Jimmy Fallon]]'' (2009âpresent) * ''[[The Tonight Show with Jay Leno]]'' (1992â2009; 2010âpresent)
===Documentary=== * ''[[Who Do You Think You Are? (U.S. TV series)|Who Do You Think You Are?]]'' (2010âpresent)
===Game shows=== *''[[Minute to Win It]]'' (2010âpresent) *''[[It's Worth What?]]'' (2011âpresent)
===Saturday morning (under the ''[[qubo]]'' banner)=== * ''[[Babar]]'' (2006-present) * ''[[Turbo Dogs]]'' (2008-present) * ''[[Willa's Wild Life]]'' (2009-present) * ''[[Shelldon]]'' (2009-present) * ''[[The Magic School Bus (TV series)|The Magic School Bus]]'' (2010-present) * ''[[Pearlie]]'' (2010-present)
===Beauty Pagents=== * ''[[Miss USA]]'' (2003âpresent) * ''[[Miss Universe]]'' (2003âpresent)
===Awards Shows=== * ''The [[Golden Globe Award]]s''
===Sports=== * [[NFL]] Coverage, which includes: **''[[Football Night in America]]'' **''[[Sunday Night Football]]'' **The [[Super Bowl]] (every three years, including the upcoming [[Super Bowl XLVI]]) **The [[Pro Bowl]] (during seasons where NBC carries the Super Bowl) **NFL Wild Card Weekend (Saturday games). *The ''[[NHL on NBC]]'', which includes: **The [[Winter Classic]] **Sunday Game of the Week **The [[Stanley Cup Finals]] *The [[Olympics on NBC|Olympics]] through 2020 *[[Notre Dame Football on NBC|Notre Dame]] Football (home games) *The [[Bayou Classic]] *The [[US Army All-American Bowl]] *The [[PGA Tour on NBC|PGA Tour]] (under the ''[[Golf Channel on NBC]]'' banner), which includes **The [[U.S. Open (golf)|U.S. Open]] **The [[U.S. Women's Open]] **The [[U.S. Senior Open]] **[[The Player's Championship]] *[[French Open]] Tennis *Horse Racing, which includes: **The [[Triple Crown of Thoroughbred Racing]] ***The [[Kentucky Derby]] ***The [[Preakness Stakes]] ***The [[Belmont Stakes]] **[[Santa Anita Derby]] **[[Hambletonian Stakes|The Hambletonian]] *The [[United States Figure Skating Championships]] *[[Major League Soccer]] (beginning 2012)
==See also== *[[2011â12 United States network television schedule]] *[[List of programs previously broadcast by NBC]]
